name: eslint-plugin-compat

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rm -rf lib && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run spec && npm run build
scripts.test-all: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run lint && npm run flow && npm run spec && npm run build
